PrecisOrder determining that the proposed amendments to the compensation plan in the COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT between the TREASURY BOARD and the PUBLIC SERVICE ALLIANCE OF CANADA as it relates to the Correctional Group (Supervisory and Non-Supervisory) do not result in any increase in the total amount of expenditures to be incurred.
